nodes.text: Wart was a pirate who operated in the Sil'Lume asteroid belt during the Galactic Civil War.

In 0 ABY, the pirates that Wart was working with were encountered by Luke Skywalker and his X-wing starfighter when he was searching for a new Rebel base. The pirates mistook Skywalker for Wart, but when they realized their mistake, they attacked him.

Wart was created by Troy Denning and appeared in one of the role-playing strands of the 1990 West End Games role-playing supplement Jedi's Honor. Due to the choose-your-own-adventure style of the scenario, Skywalker does not have to encounter Wart's pirates to progress in his mission.
